meanings: selection, select, pick out, single out, (Am) draft

examples.korean: He got the nod from the team manager. 발음듣기 그는 그 팀의 감독에게 선발되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He got the nod from the team manager. 발음

examples.korean: He was singled out as the outstanding performer of the games. 발음듣기 그는 그 경기의 우수 선수로 선발되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was singled out as the outstanding performer of the games. 발음

examples.korean: He hasn’t been selected for the team. 발음듣기 그는 그 팀에 선발되지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He hasn’t been selected for the team. 발음

examples.korean: She was chosen for the first eleven. 발음듣기 그녀는 첫 11명에 선발되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was chosen for the first eleven. 발음

examples.korean: She was lucky enough to be chosen for the team. 발음듣기 그녀는 아주 운 좋게도 그 팀에 선발되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was lucky enough to be chosen for the team. 발음
